description:
Marital status

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12211 Microcensus

Definition:
The different categories are: single, married cohabiting,
married but separated, divorced, and widowed. Married people
whose spouse is missing are regarded as married, and
previously married persons whose spouse has been declared
dead as widowed. A person who is married but separated is
someone whose spouse was temporarily or permanently away
from the surveyed household on the reference day, and the
interviewed spouse did not provide any information on the
absent spouse.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Marital status
